Translations.Text: For vzor, my sent Moses our proofs Pharaoh elders proclaiming ja bol posol Lord universe
When he showed them our proofs they laughed them
Kazdy znamenie my showed them bol velky than 1 before it My afflicted them plagues perhaps they repent
They said O ona kuzelnik implore tvoj Lord our behalf relieve this plague since ona have dohoda Him; my potom guided
Lenze mat rad skoro mat rad my relieved ich affliction they reverted
Pharaoh zahlasit do jeho ludia O moj ludia ja nie possess kingship Egypt these flowing rieka belong do mna? Ona nie see
Kto jeden je lepsie; mi ze 1 lowly viem je ledva speak
Ako pod he nie possess treasure zlaty; ako pod angels nie sprevadzat him
He thus fooled jeho ludia they obeyed him; they bol zlomyselny ludia
When they zotrvat do opposing us my punished them drowned them all
My rendered them precedent vzor others
